477990.name: Fantasy Grounds - Pulp Themed Maps
477990.description:
Pulp Themed Map Pack

Get your treasure map, gun and gear ready. This pack has 26 battle maps for a GM looking to run encounters in a pulp game and includes the following:
  • Airship interior map
  • 3 city street maps
  • Museum map
  • 2 city roof maps
  • 2 park maps
  • Illegal whiskey still
  • 2 desert market maps
  • Oasis map
  • Desert ruins map
  • 2 desert temple maps
  • 4 jungle maps
  • 2 jungle temple maps
  • grotto map
  • ship map
  • 2 hangar maps
The module contains maps optimized for online use in Fantasy Grounds.
Requirements: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Morne Schaap
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
